Executive Vice President, Chief Technology Officer and Chief Information Officer

Arne is responsible for leading GoDaddy's evolution of our globally scalable cloud, powering the business with Big Data, and linking the latest advances in technology to GoDaddy's cloud and IT strategy.
Executive Vice President, Chief Infrastructure Officer and Chief Information Officer

Responsible for leading continued improvements to the ServiceNow platform and driving expansion of the company’s cloud strategy.

Arne is one of the best managers I can think of having worked with in the last 20 years. There are a couple of things that make him stand out: - guts/confidence/persistance- Arne will take on really big projects, no fear, hundreds of millions of dollars - buckle your seatbelt!-Loyalty/team moral - Arne surrounds himself with talented AND sincere people who care about the quality of work and each other. - Intelligent - Arne knows how to get people focused on the right thing, asking the right questions, inspiring others to come through with answers.

When I joined ServiceNow as CTO, Sri was one of my first hires as we built and scaled the organization.While I didn't know him at the time, his passion and energy was contagious. He was in charge of automating and scaling the company's cloud infrastructure.It was incredibly rewarding to see firsthand how Sri grew as a leader and individual during an intense 2.5 or so year period. He has an incredible attention to detail, while at the same time being able to lay out and execute on a long term vision for the organization. During this period he completely transformed our cloud management, which ultimately helped enable the company to continue to grow and establish it's industry leadership. Sri is also an out of the box thinker and developed innovations such as our Advanced High Availability architecture.Sri has a rare combination of very strong technical skills, with very strong leadership. He managed to attract new talent and grow the team substantially. He is a magnet for talent and developed very strong hiring practices for his team.Sri is a very accomplished leader, with a very bright future ahead in technology industry. And most importantly a wonderful personality that is true pleasure to be be around.I strongly recommend Sri for technology leadership roles. He is an asset to any organization that needs to go big and needs someone with game changing capabilities.

September 16, 2013, Arne was senior to Cameron but didn’t manage directly

I have had the pleasure to work with Cameron on a number of very senior positions. Cameron brings a level of passion and energy to the job that is unparalleled. He is super responsive and I can always count on him to be available. His ability to seek our candidates and convince them to have a conversation is top notch. He is a person that simply doesn't not let go until the job is finished. Most recently he worked with me to recruit a Chief Information Security Offices to ServiceNow. Awesome hire. Thank you Cameron.

summary: Technical, operations and business executive with extensive industry experience in cloud computing, online services, data centers, networking, large scale operations and information technology. A proven track record of building and leading large and small organizations, forming compelling visions and leading through increasing challenges at global scale. Driving innovations at the frontier of technology industry. Strong cost control and financial management of budgets exceeding several hundred million dollars. Metrics driven with strong persistence and track record in meeting company goals. Extensive International experience.Specialties: Cloud computing, online services, networks, data centers and information technology.
